FuncDef: This command sets the values for the update, timeout, and flush timers.

ParaDef.Info: The RIP update timer value in seconds. Values-1 to 600. ParamDefault: Default- 30
The RIP timeout timer value in seconds. Values-1 to 1200. ParamDefault: Default- 180
The RIP flush timer value in seconds. Values-1 to 1200. ParamDefault: Default- 120
